data.text: @RIHEALTH More half truths & misleading propaganda. There’s no evidence that they’re safe either. @RIHEALTH, you’re a pharmaceutical mouthpiece pushing liability free products that don’t work & have ZERO long term safety data. You aren’t worthy of public trust.
@RIHEALTH Where’s the trials and longitudinal studies.... https://t.co/eTWU9RFCWm
@RIHEALTH See @JeanRees10 for the truth about vaccines.
@RIHEALTH Check out @JeanRees10 if you want the truth about vaccines.
@RIHEALTH There's no pfizer evidence because there have been no completed trials on pregnant women. There are however case histories on  the number of miscarriages and stillbirths.
